articles.author: Stuart Lau
articles.title: UK's Cameron tells Europe: Pressure House Speaker Johnson on Ukraine - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: European foreign ministers have ‘a real role to play’ in lobbying the senior U.S. Republican, Britain’s top diplomat says.
articles.content: U.S. President Joe Biden has been publicly pressuring House Republicans for months to pass a Ukraine aid package. Johnson, however, leads a fractious GOP caucus that has so far rebuffed efforts to ge… [+1398 chars]
